article_title: Steam's Controller Redesigned With Xbox Influences

article_metadata.description: It seems only fitting to juxtapose Amazon's hopefully-not-final ugly prototype controller with a rival device from Valve. Whereas the Amazon prototype seems instantly dated, Valve's controller is innovative, sleek and intriguing. The two don't even look like they were made in the same decade.
